entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
